data.comment: Bristol City kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Penalty! Geoff Eltringham points to the spot, great chance for Preston...
In the minute 21, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Daniel Johnson.
Preston kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 46, Bristol City make their first substitution with Antoine Semenyo replacing Han-Noah Massengo.
The away team replace Taylor Moore with Tyreeq Bakinson.
Darnell Fisher is booked for the home team.
In the minute 69, Alex Neil is making the team's first substitution at Deepdale with Emil Riis Jakobsen replacing Sean Maguire.
Joe Rafferty is replacing Darnell Fisher for the home team.
It seems as if Paul Gallagher is unable to continue. Tom Bayliss replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 80, Jayden Stockley is on a sub for Daniel Johnson for Preston.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
